name: Email Marketing Automation
description: Create sophisticated email campaigns with behavioral triggers, A/B testing, and detailed analytics. Perfect for nurturing leads and customer engagement.
author: n8n Workflow Manager

fields.name: smtpHost
fields.label: SMTP Host
fields.helpText: SMTP server hostname for sending emails

fields.name: smtpPort
fields.label: SMTP Port
fields.helpText: SMTP port number (typically 587 for TLS or 465 for SSL)

validation.message: Username must be at least 3 characters long

fields.name: smtpPassword
fields.label: SMTP Password
fields.helpText: Password or app password for SMTP authentication

validation.message: Password must be at least 6 characters long

fields.name: fromEmail
fields.label: From Email Address
fields.helpText: Email address that will appear as the sender

validation.message: Please enter a valid email address

fields.name: fromName
fields.label: From Name
fields.helpText: Name that will appear as the sender

validation.message: Name must be between 2 and 50 characters

fields.name: analyticsWebhook
fields.label: Analytics Webhook URL
fields.helpText: Optional webhook URL for custom analytics tracking

validation.message: Please enter a valid URL starting with http:// or https://

fields.name: segmentApiKey
fields.label: Segment API Key
fields.helpText: Optional: Segment API key for advanced audience segmentation

validation.message: API key must be at least 10 characters long

fields.name: campaignFrequency
fields.label: Campaign Frequency
fields.helpText: How often automated campaigns should run

fields.name: abTesting
fields.label: Enable A/B Testing
fields.helpText: Enable A/B testing for subject lines and content
